item.title: 印度招标中绿色氢气价格创历史新低
item.description: 印度可再生能源部长普拉哈德·乔希表示，该国绿色氢气供应项目已创下历史最低投标记录。【原文：India has recorded the country’s lowest-ever bid for the supply of green hydrogen, according to Renewable Energy Minister Pralhad Joshi.】

item.title: 乌克兰贪腐调查波及前部长，其逃亡未遂
item.description: 乌克兰前能源部长已成为一起影响深远的腐败调查的嫌疑人，该调查去年曾撼动总统弗拉基米尔·泽连斯基的政府，并迫使其首席助手辞职。【原文：A former Ukrainian energy minister has become a suspect in a far-reaching corruption investigation that shook the administration of President Volodymyr Zelenskiy and forced out his top aide last year.】

item.title: 英国诉讼融资商在清算核心基金后推出新方案
item.description: 英国一家诉讼融资公司清算核心基金不到六个月后，正寻求新资金注入。这家公司历经动荡的一年后，又迎来最新转折。【原文：A UK litigation funder is seeking fresh capital less than six months after it liquidated a key fund, the latest twist for a firm that’s navigated a bumpy year.】

item.title: 零散股：人工智能如何推高DRAM价格（播客）
item.description: 多年来，动态随机存取存储器（DRAM）始终是芯片行业中一个沉寂的、商品化的领域。其增长虽稳定但温和，价格总体呈下滑趋势。 如今局面骤变。人工智能催生了对DRAM的巨大需求，而消费类企业因成本激增被迫削减供应或提价。究竟是人工智能的哪些特性消耗了如此庞大的内存？市场何时才能重新平衡？本期节目中，我们将与Ray Wa展开对话。【原文：For years, DRAM — or Dynamic Random Access Memory — was kind of a sleepy, commoditized aspect of chip industry. Growth was steady, but modest, and prices just generally drifted lower. Suddenly all that’s changed. AI has created voracious demand for DRAM and consumer facing companies are being forced to either curtail supply or raise prices due to exploding costs. But what is it about AI that consumes so much memory, and when will the market rebalance itself? On this episode, we speak with Ray Wa】

item.title: 跑赢99%同行的基金预测：人工智能浪潮中软件企业难逃淘汰（注：根据要求严格保留原文结构，包括段落分隔、项目符号、标题层级等格式要素。专业术语如"AI"统一译为"人工智能"，"99%同业"准确传达"99% of Peers"
item.description: 在软件股大跌前抛售的策略让极地资本基金经理尼克·埃文斯获利颇丰。他向潜在抄底者发出警告：多数股票仍具风险，能挺过这场风暴的企业寥寥无几。【原文：Selling software stocks before the crowd paid off for Nick Evans, a Polar Capital fund manager. His warning to potential bargain hunters: most shares are still toxic and few firms will survive.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴在DeepSeek发布前夕推出重大AI模型升级
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司宣布对其旗舰人工智能模型进行重大升级，加速了与众多初创企业及行业领军者的竞争，各方都希望抢在中国引爆热潮的DeepSeek下一代平台之前占得先机。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. unveiled a major upgrade of its flagship AI model, accelerating a race with a panoply of startups and sectoral leaders aiming to get in ahead of Chinese sensation DeepSeek’s next big platform.】

item.title: 日本央行行长上田表示，高市在会谈中未提出具体要求
item.description: 日本央行行长植田和男表示，在定期召开的经济讨论会议上，首相高市早苗未提出具体要求，双方仅就经济问题交换了总体意见。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi made no specific requests during a regular meeting to discuss the economy and swap general ideas.】

item.title: 瑞士经济从美国关税冲击中反弹，重启增长
item.description: 瑞士经济在去年年底出现反弹，部分摆脱了美国总统唐纳德·特朗普实施的超额关税的影响。【原文：Switzerland’s economy rebounded at the end of last year, partially shaking off the impact of outsized tariffs inflicted by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 日本收益率曲线扭曲加剧——财政担忧与日本央行前景引发市场波动
item.description: 日本超长期债券收益率攀升，而短期利率则出现下跌，形成所谓的收益率曲线扭曲陡峭化现象。投资者正审视财政政策前景及日本央行加息路径。【原文：Japan’s super-long bond yields climbed as shorter-term rates fell, in what is known as a twist-steepening of the yield curve, as investors mull the outlook for fiscal policy and the Bank of Japan’s rate-hike path.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格跌至五周低点，因天气预报显示气温将转暖
item.description: 欧洲天然气期货跌至五周低点，因天气预报显示气温将转暖，这可能缓解燃料库存急剧减少带来的压力。【原文：European natural gas futures hit a five-week low as the weather outlook shifted milder, potentially easing strains on rapidly depleting fuel inventories.】

item.title: Lux Capital与Flutterwave首席执行官投资尼日利亚无人机制造商
item.description: 一家致力于开发自主安全系统以保护非洲大陆关键基础设施的尼日利亚初创企业，在最新一轮融资中额外筹集了2200万美元。本轮融资由风险投资公司Lux Capital领投，拉各斯独角兽企业Flutterwave的首席执行官参与投资。【原文：A Nigerian startup building autonomous security systems to protect critical infrastructure on the continent raised an additional $22 million in a new capital round that was led by venture firm Lux Capital and the chief executive officer of Lagos-based unicorn Flutterwave.】

item.title: 马来西亚国王警告称反贪机构在其“雷达”监控范围内
item.description: 马来西亚国王表示，该国反贪污委员会是其重点关注的机构之一，他敦促执政当局加大反腐力度。【原文：Malaysia’s king said the country’s anti-corruption commission is one of the institutions that’s on his ‘radar’ as he urged governing authorities to step up the fight against graft.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚通胀放缓幅度低于预期，因增税拖累
item.description: 罗马尼亚通胀缓解幅度低于预期，因政府增税和紧缩措施持续压制物价，并阻碍央行放松货币政策。【原文：Romanian inflation eased less than expected as the government’s tax hikes and austerity measures continue to weigh on prices and prevent the central bank from easing monetary policy.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行另类投资部门Capza为基金筹集14亿欧元
item.description: 据彭博新闻社获得的一份声明显示，由法国巴黎银行最终控股的另类投资公司Capza已为其新设立的私募信贷基金筹集了近14亿欧元（约合17亿美元）。【原文：The alternative investment firm Capza, which is ultimately owned by BNP Paribas, has raised almost €1.4 billion ($1.7 billion) for a new private credit fund, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 澳大利亚并购市场因麦格理-Qube 80亿澳元交易重燃活力
item.description: 由麦格理牵头的财团以117亿澳元（83亿美元）收购Qube控股有限公司，为澳大利亚并购交易商注入了亟需的活力。此前2025年交易环境艰难，今年初更错失至少一笔重大交易机会。【原文：The A$11.7 billion ($8.3 billion) acquisition of Qube Holdings Ltd. by a Macquarie-led group has given dealmakers in Australia a much-needed lift after a tricky 2025 and at least one big missed opportunity early this year.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产小幅走高，离岸人民币汇率走强
item.description: 新兴市场资产在节假日期间交投清淡中微幅走高，得益于人民币汇率走强以及市场预期美联储将在今年晚些时候降息。【原文：Emerging market assets edged higher in thin holiday trading, buoyed by a firmer Chinese yuan and expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates later this year.】

item.title: 富时100指数有望上涨，英镑保持稳定
菲律宾金融科技公司Maya据称正考虑进行高达10亿美元的美国IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，菲律宾金融科技公司Maya正考虑在美国进行首次公开募股（IPO），预计融资规模在5亿美元至10亿美元之间。该公司由此加入了东南亚企业寻求在海外交易所上市的行列。【原文：Philippine financial-technology firm Maya is considering a US initial public offering that may raise $500 million to $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter, joining the ranks of Southeast Asian firms seeking to list their shares on overseas exchanges.】

item.title: 沙特对华石油销售量激增，因油价降至五年低点
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯向最大进口国中国出售的原油量在3月装运量出现增长，此前该国将亚洲买家主要原油等级的价格下调至五年多来的最低水平。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s crude sales to top importer China for loading in March rose after the kingdom cut the price of its main oil grade for buyers in Asia to the lowest level in more than five years.】

item.title: 勒庞的阴影正笼罩着欧洲央行行长拉加德的继任之争
item.description: 在接替克里斯蒂娜·拉加德的竞争中，领导人何时选定下一任欧洲央行行长的问题，其重要性几乎与人选本身同样突出。【原文：In the race to succeed Christine Lagarde, the question of when leaders choose the next European Central Bank president is looming almost as large as who they pick.】

item.title: 皮克特在南非设立分支机构，因私人财富增长，BD称
item.description: 据《商业日报》报道，皮克特银行（Banque Pictet & Cie SA）在南非开设了办事处，这是这家瑞士私人银行在220年历史中首次进驻非洲市场。【原文：Banque Pictet & Cie SA opened an office in South Africa, the first time the Swiss private lender has had a presence in Africa in its 220-year history, Business Day reported.】

item.title: 曾主导沙特债务扩张的银行家将推动外商直接投资
item.description: 约十年前，沙特阿拉伯选中一位资深银行家协助建立债务市场计划，该计划使该王国跻身全球最活跃的债券发行国之列。他的下一个任务是帮助利雅得吸引海外资金，并使年度外国直接投资在2030年前增至1000亿美元，实现三倍增长。【原文：About a decade ago, Saudi Arabia picked a veteran banker to help set up a debt-market program that’s since transformed the kingdom into one of the most prolific bond issuers globally. His next task is to help Riyadh draw in overseas cash and triple annual foreign direct investment to $100 billion by 2030.】

item.title: 瑞典为何改变接纳欧元的立场
item.description: 如同德国马克、法国法郎和芬兰马克一样，瑞典克朗终将沦为历史遗物——如果该国支持欧元的人士得偿所愿的话。【原文：Like the German mark, French franc and Finnish markka, Sweden’s krona may one day become a relic of the past — if the country’s proponents of the euro get their way.】

item.title: 分形股份在孟买上市首日股价下跌，此前在印度完成3.13亿美元IPO
item.description: 分形分析有限公司周一在孟买股市首次亮相即遭遇股价下跌，这表明在整体低迷的股市环境中，投资者对科技初创企业的热情持续低迷，估值问题仍是主要顾虑。【原文：Fractal Analytics Ltd. shares fell in their Mumbai trading debut on Monday, signaling continued weakness in investor appetite for technology startups amid valuation concerns in an otherwise subdued stock market.】

item.title: MiniMax Shares Surge 25% as Optimism Over Chinese AI Firms Grows
item.description: MiniMax Group Inc. shares surged in Hong Kong, buoyed by growing investor confidence in the technology offered by China’s generative AI startups.

item.title: Japan’s Ex FX-Chief Says Rate Hike Needed for Market Stability
item.description: Japan’s former currency chief said the Bank of Japan is “behind the curve” on taking policy action, adding that higher interest rates would help address inflation and stabilize markets.

item.title: Indian Stocks Face Fresh Pressure After Central Bank Action
item.description: India’s $5.2 trillion stock market has had a soft start to the year, and it could face further pressure as new regulatory measures to moderate trading activity add to existing concerns about corporate profit growth and foreign flows.

item.title: Singapore Home Sales See Slower Start to Year on Buyer Caution
item.description: Singapore’s new home sales got off to a slow start to the year after a couple of projects drew mixed responses from cautious buyers.
